definition: Zhangzi county in Shanxi 山西[Shan1 xi1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
Changzhi county in Changzhi 長治|长治[Chang2 zhi4], Shanxi

sentences.english: So he swore an oath to him, selling his birthright to Jacob.
sentences.chinese: 以掃就對他起了誓，把長子的名分賣給雅各。

sentences.english: Here then emerges the historical difficulty of Primogeniture.
sentences.chinese: 這時候，“長子繼承權”就成爲歷史上的難題了。

sentences.english: The millionaire's property descended to his eldest son.
sentences.chinese: 那個百萬富翁的財產傳給了他的長子。

sentences.english: Of the Shilonites: Asaiah the firstborn and his sons.
sentences.chinese: 示羅的子孫中有長子亞帥雅和他的衆子。

sentences.english: And he said unto Jether his firstborn, Up, and slay them.
sentences.chinese: 於是對他的長子益帖說，你起來殺他們。

sentences.english: The building will devolve to his eldest son.
sentences.chinese: 這座大樓將轉交給其長子。

sentences.english: The Son of God is the first-born of many brothers.
sentences.chinese: 天主子是衆弟兄中的長子。

sentences.english: Koizumi's eldest son, Kotaro, is a professional actor.
sentences.chinese: 小泉的長子孝太郎是一名職業演員。

sentences.english: And of the Shilonites； Asaiah the firstborn， and his sons.
sentences.chinese: 示羅的子孫中有長子亞帥雅和他的衆子。

sentences.english: At his father's bedside, Fan Dachong, the eldest son, promised he would look after the books.
sentences.chinese: 在父親的牀邊，範答銃，長子，許諾他會看的書籍。

sentences.english: The estate falls to the eldest son.
Now, Japanese are looking to his eldest son for further change.
sentences.chinese: 現在，日本正在盼望他的長子做出進一步改變。

sentences.english: The king's oldest son is heir apparent to the throne.
sentences.chinese: 國王的長子是王位的法定繼承人。

sentences.english: Judah got a wife for Er, his firstborn, and her name was Tamar.
sentences.chinese: 猶大爲長子珥娶妻，名叫他瑪。

sentences.english: The sons of Laadan； the chief was Jehiel， and Zetham， and Joel， three.
sentences.chinese: 拉但的長子是耶歇，還有細坦和約珥，共三人。

sentences.english: Also on the train to Sichuan were Li's wife and their first son.
sentences.chinese: 李萬勝的妻子以及剛出生的長子也同車前往四川。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
Zheng state during the Warring States period/surname Zheng/abbr. for 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
person (first person, second person etc in grammar)/called/known as

Sun Tzu, also known as Sun Wu 孫武|孙武[Sun1 Wu3] (c. 500 BC, dates of birth and death uncertain), general, strategist and philosopher of the Spring and Autumn Period (700-475 BC), believed to be the author of the “Art of War” 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
adoption (e.g. of a nephew as a son)/to inherit
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
